name: Oosthuizens Attorneys
description: Oosthuizens Attorneys requested a minimalist site where potential clients can reach them,learn more about their history and the legal services they offer, and also get in touch with them regarding legal advice.

name: HundredFold
description:
Hundredfold is an Africa focused strategy company that prides itself in international networks and global collaborations. 

They were in need of a sleek & modern brand identity and accompanying website to show off their capabilities & the industries they operate in.

name: Gemma Institute
description:
The GEMMA Institute is a Psychotherapy Clinic based in Frankfurt, Germany. They assist individuals, couples and families experiencing personal and social challenges.

We met their needs by creating a clean & modern website where they can effectively communicate their therapeutic concept and how their therapy works. Custom functionality includes the ability for patients to apply for & complete the relevant consent documentation online, as well as provide feedback for their sessions at the clinic. 

 Their website is available in both English & German.

name: PR Engineering
description:
PR Engineering is a consulting engineering firm providing comprehensive and value-driven design and project management services. 

They were in the market for a website with the primary focus being to exhibit their past & current engineering products to prospective new clients. The website also needed to properly showcase the cast array of professional services they offer & other important information relating to the company.

name: Varkhart
services: Web Design & Development | Web Application Development
description:
Varkhart started as a small e-commerce store but has since grown to a vast online retail endeavour with a substantial online presence. Originally built upon our custom e-commerce platform, it has since grown to encompass fully-fledged reseller & affiliate programs. 

We were involved for every step of the project, from branding to product development. If you'd like to check it out for yourself, head over to

name: Africaneur IQ
description:
AfricaneurIQ (AIQ) is a professional service company that delivers rapid, equitable and sustainable economic transformation through Enterprise and Supplier Development. 

They had a well-crafted brand identity and required a website revamp that truly captures their existing brand image and defines what they do in a succinct and easy to digest manner.

name: SmartFunder
services: Web Design & Development | Web Application Development
description: SmartFunder is a mechanism for Employers in South Africa to assist their employees to pay school fees in a smarter, more tax-efficient way. They wanted a website that reflects their friendly, user-centric brand and provides information regarding their services in a simple, easy-to-understand way. Their main goal was to explain how their business model works and answer any lingering questions.

name: Reset Capital
description:
Reset Capital (RC) is an investment firm with a unique focus on investment opportunities in BEE companies. 

Their site features content regarding their funding principles and investment focus, presented in a clean and minimalistic fashion.

name: NC Chemicals
services: Web Design & Development | Web Application Development
description:
NC Chemicals is a manufacturer and distributor of cleaning chemicals for the car wash and industrial industry. 

They originally needed a simple online presence featuring who they are and what they do, as well as accompanying print documents to be designed showcasing their product catalogue. 

We recommended integrating our e-commerce platform into their website to function as a one-stop-shop to showcase & sell their products online, from anywhere.

name: Craft Consulting
description:
Craft Consulting is a Cape Town based Civil & Structural Engineering firm. 

They needed a minimalist & clean website to showcase their services & previous projects. They struggled with establishing a good design with the DIY website builder Wix and required professional help with their website's redesign. 

They requested to keep the dark & moody theme, but with a complete design overhaul & updated content to match their current brand image.

name: The Mish Dish
services: Web Design & Development | Web Application Development
description:
The Mish Dish as a unique & personalised food-blog with a twist. 

Originally starting off with a Weebly site, Mish realised the inherent shortcomings of a WYSIWYG website builder and requested we help her with setting up a food blog. 

She required the ability to administer the recipes themselves and needed the blog to have a unique UX & UI that enticed readers to return.

name: CCPT
description:
Cape Control Panel Technology (CCPT) is an engineering firm that builds specialised power and control panels. 

They needed a concise website showcasing their capabilities, their team of experts and projects they 've undertaken in the past.

name: Isaacson Ladders
description:
Isaacson Ladders is a manufacturer based in Johannesburg that produces & wholesales ladders, castors, trolleys and wheels. 

They required a website revamp that works in symbioses with their current brand and functions as a platform to showcase a catalogue of the products they manufacture, as well as provide valuable information relating to the company.
